description: Windows monitoring dashboard for Prometheus with comprehensive resource overview and detailed metrics. Compatible with windows_exporter 0.31.1+ and optimized for Grafana v12+.

targets.expr: windows_os_info{job=~"$job"}*on(instance)group_right(fqdn,product)(windows_os_hostname{job=~"$job"}*on(instance)group_right(hostname,family,nic)(windows_net_nic_address_info{job=~"$job",nic!~"isatap.*|Teredo Tunneling Pseudo-Interface|Microsoft Wi-Fi Direct Virtual Adapter|Bluetooth Device.*|Microsoft Hyper-V Network Adapter|VirtualBox.*|VMware.*|Loopback.*",address!~"127.*|169.*|fe80.*"}))

panels.title: Network Details by Host (Max Traffic NIC)
Disk I/O Details by Host (Max Activity)
Disk I/O Details by Host (Max Activity)

title: Windows Exporter Dashboard
